law.catch_line: Bag and creel limits -- Limit on possession -- Migratory birds.

text.section: No person shall take more wildlife in any one (1) day than the bag or creel limit prescribed for the species by the department.
A person who has hunted two (2) or more days in succession may transport as personal baggage a total of not more than twice the bag limit as set by the regulations for any one (1) day.
Federal and state regulations shall apply to all migratory birds and waterfowl.

law.history: Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 17. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 1. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 46. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 18. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 32. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 7. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 34. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1954d-55.
